name: Souper !
description:
Souper ! is a 2D, ragdoll physics platformer made in a week for the BTP jam!

- When earth was created, you were made with a little less, and everything else a little more, making it almost impossible to complete mundane tasks such as... making a pot of soup - 

As a tiny human in a giant world, your task is simple: make a pot of soup.

Controls * This game is best experienced with a mouse! *

  • A and D to move
  • Click and drag left and right mousebuttons to move arms
  • Click and hold left and right mousebuttons to hold objects. Let go to throw.
  • Simultaneously throw arms up and spacebar for high jump!
